message.body: I got another letter from domestic relations saying they are issuing a bench warrant, I told him but he doesn't seem to be doing anything about it, I just didn't want to be the only to know
Did you tell him.
Yes I told him
Sorry I just re read this.
Oh it's ok, it's long
Have u seen him or heard from him lately.
I saw him yesterday. He tells me they are taking money out of his paycheck, but it can't be true. He just gets dismissive when I ask him about it
Where will I send child support. The address is in mt. Gretna.
I found an address online in Harrisburg...is that what you used before? It's for Pennsylvania SCDU PO box 69110 Harrisburg pa 17106-9110
I do not know. I eill try. Dou know how much.
Were you able to get ahold of him? He's not getting back to me
No I did not speak to him.
Did he get a warrent?
Ugh so frustrating..his past due amount is something like 1900, I don't know the exact amount
The letter I got said he had ten days to avoid a warrant
Ok thanks. I will snd it. Did you not get any money from him.
He said he was paying. I am so sorry you did not have much money. I will make sure. You get the money in the future.
Thank
Oops
I am just going to deduct it from his inheiratence. Sorry I am a horrid speller.
Thank you, yeah he told me he was too but I hadn't gotten anything since your payment in may..it hasn't been too bad, but I definitely need some new things for school, all my shoes have holes haha
So in the longrun he will pay.
Oh, thats a good idea! I'm a bad speller too, my phone just fixes it for me
Thank you for always being there when I am in need, it really means a lot to me
Oh I need one of them.
You are welcome. I think this way will be best. Then we will not be driven so#########crazy by him. I just cannot let him go to jail. Although I know I should.
No I agree, jail would not be good for Wes, I just wish there was a way to get his head out of his ###..but it's not going to help anyone if he is locked up
I agree. Let's try to do this the best for you and I . Tell Ella I love her. I will be home the first weekin sept. Love to you both actually.
I put the check in the mail today. You should get 2000. Soon. Please let me know when you get it. Can u let anyone know it is in the mail if the ten days
are almost up.
Thank you, I will get in touch with them, and let you know when I get it. All is well here, take care.
You said you will be back in sept? Is there anyway you can pick Ella up from school sept 7th? So she can stay with you overnight? It's the welcoming ceremony at bryn mawr
Yes I can . Do u still have my car. I will be home on sept.5th . Wold u have it back by then please. Do he still have the ezpass..
No, he gave the ez pass back after he cooled off..I can have it back by then no problem, thanks so much.
I money was deposited, Ella and I are out getting school clothes now, she is picking out cute things. And Wes should be fine as long as payments are made regularly. Thanks again!
Megan Make sure they know at school that I am picking her up.
On Friday.
Ok, I will let them know. Also, I dropped the car off Sunday, the key is on the table.
Yes I know you did. You locked Wes out.:))
Haha, he told me. Oops! The carpets look great, no tree bark or glass
Good. I am coming home tomorrow.
Have a safe trip, it's really rainy here
Ella's first day is a half day, can you get her at 12:20?
On Friday. Right.
Ok, thanks! Also I got a check today, thank you!!!!
Really. Was it from wes I only sent the 2000.
It ws another official check for two hundred, from your bank or investment company or something..
Ok. How much are you suppose to get each mo.
I will check exact amount, I think it is 330
Ok. Thanks.
Can I take ella to a play feb.23. I know it is a long way off. But I want good seats for her.
Sure! What play?
Imago Theatre Zoozoo.
I just got a parking ticket in the mail from phillie. Is it already paid.
Oh! Yes! Sorry, it's on my to do list, I will pAy it tonight!
Ella isn't feeling well, she was at my moms but my mom thinks she may not be well enouugh to go to school, and wants to know if she should just belong her to your place?
I'm going to call her insurance company to get a referral to your area
I do not have any inhalers.
I do have one container of albuteral.
My mom took Ella in last night and got inhalers and an rx...also, good news for future reference, her insurance
Company told me that wherever she is in the country, you can take her to an er and her insurance will work. SAme with cvs for prescriptions
Good that is so nice to know. She is coming here soon.
Have a good weekend.
Yeah, it was a huge relief to find out. Let me know how she is doing with her meds
At hosp. In Lebanon. She is being seen. Will be in touch. She is ok.
Your mom called I could not answer. Tell her I will call later.
How are things there?
She is getting a treatment. She is feeling better. No longer indents in her neck when she breathing. Low oxygen in her blood she is at 93 needs to be 100.
Ok, good, I'm at the doctors too, I keep getting very bad dizzy spells. Let me know when you get out of there
Will do. Sorry to hear you are sick also. Keep me posted.
Ok will do..my brother was sick all week too, I think that's what Ella caught
Hi Megan. I have been thinking of you. Did you get any tests done this weekend?
I had blood taken, and went to the eye specialist yesterday, but my eyes are healthy. They think I might have ear rocks, so I have to see my primary dr tomorrow.
I also asked my mom to bring Ella to Philly but she is still at work
So I haven't heard from her, but I don't see why she wouldn't, she has stuff to bring to me anyway
ok good . Ella is still on the inhalers. She is with <loe now but do not have a lot of energy . She doing much better.
Hi Megan. I will not be leaving Tess with you next week. I know you have to much going on. I will do it another time when you are better and I am not gon
e so long.
Ok, maybe that is best. Maybe we could do a weekend or a week when you get back. How long will you be gone again?
Until oct. 3rd. How is Ella. Did she go to school today.
She is well, yes, she went in today, and did fine,although she was a little nervous on the way there.
Hi Megan. I figured out that the 200. That you got was monet I sent you for your phone. I do not know why it took so long to get to you. I set up your mo
nthly payment. You will get 350. A month around the 20th of each month. I hope this works for you . I can change the date if you want it to come at a dif
ferent time.
I should say the 20th is when it leaves my account. I do not know how long it takes to process.
Oh, ok thank you!
That is a relief, I really appreciate it
Did u let the school know I am getting Ella because I am sure wes did not.
Sure, have fun this weekend..she has a book report to write for Tuesday, and she is supposed to tell you, but I thought i would mention it incase she "forgets" : )
I do not have any meds for Ella. Is there any where I can get any?
Yes, any CVS pharmacy. I can call in an rx in the am, what is the closest cvs? They already have her insurance info
Good. Cvs at cedar crest square in Lebanon
Ok, I will request both inhAlers, so you have them. I will text u to let u know when they are ready
Hey, you just have to call the cvs you want to go to and they can access it
Ok
Megan can I get her hair cut.
Of course, please!
What do u think about ella having her own computer for her bday. Will it be to hard to control?
I think that would be nice, I will probably just have to keep it so she doesn't use it all the time, ha
Also, I was thinking about getting a car so I can get her and I to school, the trains are a pain. Would you be able to help me with it? I'm going to try to find something cheap
Are u thinking of getting something to pay monthly .
I would love to find something cheap enough to buy outright, but maybe a monthly payment
Eva was going to get a new car. Let me talk to her. Are you going to get an older one.
I should have said is it ok if I ask Eva,
Oh yeah, please, see what she says. I assumed older would be more in my price range.
Can I call you.
On train, I will call u soon
Well maybe tomorrow morning. Rich will be in church. I want this to be private.
Ok
Do you happen to have any rugs you aren't using? I want to put one in my bedroom for winter
I do not. There is one down stairs but it belongs to rich.
Birthday is coming.
It's true!
Hi ?egan where is Ella going to be this weekend? She is invited to adens party across the street. On Sunday at 3:00.
She has a Girl Scouts hike Saturday, but thinking about coming to lanc to look for a car after
Ok I am her with charlotte. I will take her sat through Sunday. I cannot drive her to phillie. I think she will love the party. If u pick up a gift for
Aden I will pay u back. He is going to be nine.
Do u think u will come here tomorrow.
We are going to come Sunday. Her hike and celebration go on until five tomorrow
Oh my god. Someone just gave you a car. It is an old one but good. Call me.
Is Wes' car still in riches name?
Oh no he put it in his name when he got it.
I mean it is in wes's name.
Ok. I guess it's not running, it's been in front of my house for weeks
He has to have it inspected. Did you talk to Leo?
I just talked to him, we are going to try to meet next weekend, thanks again for setting this up!
Hi megan. How is the car? Can I have Ella the weekend of the 10th. Can you neice and nephew come to a little bday lunch for her.
The car is wonderful! So happy with it. Yes you may have her that weekend, and I will check with my brother. Do you have Leo and Vera's address? I would like to send them a card
I have it in mt. Gretna. I am coming home and going to Tillman Island with them this weekend. So I will get it for you. Please remind me if I do no send it.
Ok, thank you
Hi hope all is well with you.
Do you still want a rug for your bday.
Yes, that would be really great!
Hi Megan I am having Ellas bday party at 200 next Sat. Nov 10th. Hope all is well and this works. Are her cousins going to come?
Let me check again with my mom, I haven't heard. Yes, that works fine, will you be getting her from school Friday?
Yes. But not today.
Haha, right
Do you know lea's email? Ella has a fundraiser at school and wants to send her a link. And yours
What color rug do u want and how big.
Hmm, I'm not sure of the dimensions of my room. I guess it is about the size of your dining room, but the rug doesn't need to fill the room
Tan color?
Maybbe something a little darker, so it doesn't get dirty?
Ok
Also, since Ella isn't going to school tomorrow, my mom can bring her back with her instead of you driving all the way to Philly
how is she doing?
Good, she's been clear since yesterday
Do you have an orange inhaler there? The twice daily one, Flovent?
Yes I do.
Call me when you can.
What is your house number?
Is your brother coming.
Should I wake Ella and give her inhaler during the night.
Only if she seems like she is struggling
I order her a cool short hair doll. She has to be cool.:))
She always tells me I don't know what cool is, ha
Hi. I am going to Ella a new Pokémon game OK.
I got her soul silver for her ds
Can u think of anything else to get her.
Hmmm.. She could always use craft/art supplies
Hi. Please send Hellas flovent. I do not have her daily meds.
Megan Britt wants to know if you got Ella the web kin Pegasus.
She did not, she would be very happy to have it tho!
Oh, that is really nice, he likes to cook a lot. He also likes plants and coffee. He does not like chocolate tho.
OK.
Any suggestions for Chris' gift?
Also are the pajamas kind of plain or silly this year?
They are boring plain . Sorry did not have enough time for funny. It crept up on me fast.
They may be silly without me knowing:)
Will you bring the cord to recharge the DS. I think she will go over the edge if she gets new games And cannot play with them.
Sorry we found the cord. Hope you were not looking for it.
Oh good, I thought we packed it but was afraid it fell out
there before noon on Friday OK.
Hi I will come and get Ella on Friday. Will you get her Sunday before 3:30. We are going out to dinner and we are leaving about 3:30 or 4:00. I will be
Can I get Ellas hair cut.
Please! I asked Wes to yesterday. Her bangs are out of control
I do not have any flovent. Can call CVS tomorrow.
The orange daily one.
Sorry. I was wrong the orange in hailer is in her bag.
Oh good ok
Her temp. Is down . I gave he'd advil. She is doing better tonight.
How is she feeling?
se. I think Shaw an infection some where.
Her breathing is OK. But her temp. Went to 103.7 during the night. I am out of advil and it is starting to go up again. Actually I have a quarter of a do
I will pick some up on the way, anything else
I should bring?
No thanks. Just her med. Card. She has to be seen today.
Hello, we are doing fine. January 18 is when Ella does not have Girl Scouts, is that the weekend you are free to have her?
Sorry I did not mean to call you. Yes the 18 the is good.
I am so glad she is better. This is the first time she I know of her fighting it of without meds. Happy new year.
How is Ella.
She is doing great, her cough is clearing up, no more fevers, good appetite. Very strange that it just went away
I just shopped for her. Lots of new clothing. Can u think of anything she needs.
She could always use socks!
OK.
How is she doing.
She is doing wonderful, we are out getting her Girl Scouts uniform now : )
Oh. How sweet. I just sent. 200. If you need anything just. Ask. I will always help you and Ella.
Thank you, that means a lot to me
Next Monday is Martin Luther king day, would you be able to keep Ella until Monday morning? She doesn't have school
ou Friday.
Yes that will be good. I hope she does not get this flu. Rich is a little sick. Just letting you know in case he gets worse. I do not want to surprise y
Oh ok, I hope he feels better. I had a sore throat today, I hope it passes
That is what he has. Several people said that is how the flue is starting.
Oh no..
How is everyone feeling? I'm much better.
We are OK. Rich is getting better. All is well for Friday. Did u hear about the abduction of a little girl in west pbillie yesterday.
What time is zumba.
Sorry.
Yes, isn't that terrible? So scary
Please do not leave her alone. I cannot imagine what that family or little girl is going through. Take care.
She was found in a playground and taken to the hospital, the story is very bizarre. The school is in big trouble.
Oh good I did not know that.
Yes it's good news, but still scary.
Do you have any ceramic pots you aren't using? For plants?
How big.
Hmm...I'm not sure, I need to go up from 5 inch pots.
I will check.
Thank you!
Did you let the school know I was picking her up.
Yes, she is expecting you
Have fun this weekend!!
We are home. I do not have any flovent. I do have albuteral.
Can u call it into CVS . Can I get it without the card.
She has a yearly dr appointment Tuesday, he doesn't want her to take the Flovent until then. Sehe p
She hasn't had it since last weekend
If that is a problem maybe I can go to wish you were here and get your moms tomorrow.
OK.
Ask her about Cinderella, if she hasn't already told you!
How is everyone?
All is well. Chloe is over and they are playing dolls. She was up at 5:30. Showered and out to see Rosie by 8:30.
Wow! She is an early riser.
Also, she has Girl Scout cookies to sell, I will bring the order sheet if you would like some
Sure . She has been telling me about it for a long time.
That's cute. She is really proud of Girl Scouts. Did she tell you about the badge ceremony?
Yes a little. She said she got a badge like that had in the 50ies.
Yes she got a few. Very sweet.
Any photos.
Not very good ones. I only had my phone. I will email them to you
Leaving philly now!
When are you leaving for Maine?
Feb.11 to the 20th. Then when I get back Ella and I have the play on the23rd. I will also take her on Feb 8th. If you want.
What do you think. Did u want me to have her a different time.
I have an event at school on the 15th, but I think Wes can watch her. You may have her on the 8th if you like
Actually, I'm sorry, her friends birthday party is on the 9th, she won't want to miss that
Can Ella come for the weekend.
Ella just told me wes planned to take her there..can they come Saturday? She is supposed to sell Girl Scout cookies at the market Saturday am
Sure.that sounds good.
Ok perfect, she will be done at 11. I sent Wes a message too
Problem.... I cannot bring her back on Sunday. I have people coming to dinner.
Isn't Wes staying over?
I do not know . I only heard from you that he was coming. I will check.
He told me they were coming back early Sunday...he will be over this afternoon, I will ask
not be able to have her until Feb 22nd.
Any idea what is happening tomorrow. I will come and get her tomorrow if you can get her on Sunday. If you do not want to bother that is fine too. I will
Wes tells me he is going and bringing her back. I told him to call you, they are leaving around 11 tomorrow an
Am
He just called. Sorry to have bothered you. But I did not know what the hell was happening.
Not a problem, I haven't made any plans because I wasn't really sure what was happening either
Is this the weekend Riley will be there?
He was suppose to be here but they came last week. Wes did not know that. I thought he was working. But he got it of to see Riley.
Oh ok. Ella is excited to see you anyway.
Looking really far ahead, I have a friend getting married in Baltimore the weekend of April 27, do you think you could get Ella that weekend?
Oh I am really sorry I cannot. Rich and I will be out west . Hiking the Grand canyon. If u get really stuck think about Britt.
Oh ok, thanks! What are the dates you are going to be gone again? So I can put them in my calendar
We are going about April 10th a and we will be gone for a month.
Can Ella come for the weekend.
￼I just found this envelope in Ellas baby books. Hope she got her lunch that day:)
Thats funny!
Is this weekend the play? The 23rd?
￼Yes it is. I will get her Friday if that is OK.
Hi Megan. Does Ella have any nice shoes to wear this weekend?
No, we just got rid of her Mary Janes because they were too small
OK I WL vet her some tomorrow.
Did you call the school?
Wes dropped her off this morning, I think he told them. I will call just in case
Everything ok?
Yes everything is fine. New ballet style shoes. New coat for next winter. And new slippers She really needed the slippers . So she said.
￼Tired girl.
Oh good! I know, I keep hoping it gets warm before she completely outgrows/wears out the coat she has now. Have fun tomorrow : )
What time would you like me there tomorrow?
How about 3:00. Earlier off u want.
That sounds good, see you then
Would you like me to bring any of Ella's Girl Scout cookies today?
Sure. One of each.
How is Ella ? Sunday I was thinking she was getting sick.
She's good, Wes had her last night. Would you be able to help me get her some spring school clothes? The mall was closed when we went so we are going this weekend
Sure. How much.
Like two? She's excited to go, no more baby clothes :)
OK.
Thank you!
Hi Megan. I was checking to see if Ella wants to come this weekend because first I need a sitter for Sat. Night.
No this weekend she is going to the museum with Girl Scouts. Weekend after?
I will check to make sure. Lea is coming the end of the month for a week. I want her to come then. I need to make sure of the dates. K will be in touch.
Hi Megan. I got a sitter for sat. 16th So Ella can come for the weekend. Can you get later on Sunday. I have Rich,s step kids coming for St. Patty,s day
dinner and Ella likes to be with Beckham.
Yes, that sounds good.
kend. If she wants to do The two of then that is fine with me.
Hi Megan. I want Ella to come the weekend of the 22nd. Britt and lea are coming. If 2 weeks in a row are to much for her then I would cancel the 15th wee
She doesn't want to not go on the fifteenth. She said she is mature enough to handle it, haha
You are picking Ella up from school today?
Yes I am.
Ok, have fun this weekend!
Will u call the school?
Yes
What do you think about Ella having a gmail account?
Hmmm. I'm not sure. I guess she will have to eventually. I always just used mine in case anyone weird on any of her social sites tried to contact her
OK I will not do it. If she can use yours that is fine. I just thought it was a good way to get her writing.
That's a good idea, she could write to you and Brit and lea. I mean it would be fine because we would have her password
Can we kid proof her account.
I'm not sure, maybe?
Cutie! Is it snowing there?
Yes.
What time is dinner/when should I come to get her?
They are coming at 4:00 so six would be good.
Do u want to have dinner with us?
I'm going to work on my research paper today, so I might not leave until around four, but thank you
How is everyone?
All is well. Ella and lea are gone to Friendly's. She is sick of me and wants to see your mom. But she is not going until Tuesday.
Britt is having another baby. Due in Oct. She is really sick this time. She has lost A lot of weight.
Ella was really good with the kids this time. She even said she likes Charlotte. But she keeps checking to see if she is still the favorite.
Haha, I think she is starting to like being the big cousin. Poor Britt, I hope everything is ok, I'm sorry to hear she is sick, but it is exciting that there will be a little one.
Ella just got her new brace. Pink camouflage this time : )
Does her sneakers fit.
No, we tried
e to see her tripping with shoes to big for her left foot.
I will send you money to get some. Please get her two pairs to fit both brace and foot. I will send $200. To get her set up .Is that OK with you? I hat
Agreed, this one will definitely need a larger size, there is more foam ankle support on the outside.
Olly gives you half off the second pair of shoes when you get two different sizes
Hi Megan. How are you. What is Ella's last day of school. I am trying to set my summer up.
Vera and Leo wants to come up but I do not want company if I have Ella.
Ella's last day is the 20 of June. Pretty late this year
te school for her?
OK thank. Can. She come to Me. With me this summer? I was thinking until about the 15 the. What do u think. Any summer.plans. did you hear from the priva
She is already expecting to go to Maine ; ) she is on the wait list, and the school is moving into a larger building so they expect to add students, but I haven't heard anything new
Can Ella stay with you the weekend of may 3?
hard trip to go from Gretna to Phillie to Dc. So give me some time to figure this out.
I think I can but I was going to go to DC to see Britt and Charlotte. I am not sure how that will work. Let me talk to Britt first. I remember it was a
Ok, thank you, let me know when you do. There is an end of the year get together at school that weekend. Hope everyone is well, take care
Hi. I can take Ella the may 3rd. Weekend. The weekend with Britt is the 18th. It all works out.
Oh wonderful! Thank you! How is britt feeling?
Doing much better. No longer sick.
These are the budget cuts for Ella's school next year. Scared
Gifted is being cut
That sucks. I hope she gets in a private school.
Me too
Ella has a half day Friday, would you be able to get her from school at 12:20?
Yes ii can. Please make sure wes has meds for her to give to me. I would like to talk to you soon. Call me when you get a chance.
Hi. When will I expect you.
When would you like me to come?
Ella said 5:00.
Haha, ok
Call me when you get a chance.
Website. State.gov
I just got the date for the transplant. June 7th. So Ella will not need a passport right now. I will not return until about the 27th of June. I will take her when I get back.
